title: Coleen Rooney finally breaks silence amid WAG war with Rebekah Vardy
text:
Coleen has returned to social media amid a controversial falling out with Becky Vardy (Picture: Getty Images)

Coleen Rooney has broken her silence following her accusations of providing fake stories to the press levelled at fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy recently.

The mother-of-four returned to social media over the weekend to explain she was forced to skip out of the family vacation in Barbados after falling poorly.

Husband Wayne was sunning himself with the couple’s sons Kai, nine, Klay, six, and Kit, three, as well as Coleen’s parents Colette and Anthony McLoughlin, while Coleen hung back in the UK with their youngest, Cass, one, and recuperated.

Taking to Twitter, the 33-year-old posted a sweet shot of her baby all rugged up and chilling among the autumnal leaves.

A stark contrast to the swimming trunks he was expected to be wearing – still, the sun is shining, the birds are chirping, you can’t go wrong!

‘Lovely morning in the fresh air with Cass. We had planned to be with the rest of our family in Barbados for half term break,’ Coleen’s message on Sunday began.

‘Unfortunately I became poorly with an infection before we were due to leave. I am not able to join them for the time being, even though I am feeling better.’

Fans of Coleen chimed in to share their well wishes for a speedy recovery, while the WAG replied to another fan saying she wanted to ‘put it out there’ before people made assumptions as to why she wasn’t with her kids overseas.

It’s the first time Coleen has publicly spoken since she accused Jamie Vardy’s wife and reality star Rebekah of providing fake stories to the press nearly two weeks ago. Rebekah has vehemently denied the claims.

I’m a Celeb star Becky was on holiday with her family in Dubai when Coleen made her accusations earlier in October, writing on Instagram that she had suspected the WAG of providing stories and so set up an elaborate sting to expose Rebekah.

Rebekah and Coleen are at war (Picture: Backgrid; Rex)

Coleen took to social media as she wrote: ‘For a few years now someone I trusted to follow me on my personal Instagram account has been consistently informing The Sun newspaper of my private posts and stories.

‘There has been so much information given to them about me, my friends and my family – all without my permission or knowledge. After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion.

‘To try and prove this, I came up with an idea. I blocked everyone from viewing my Instagram stories except ONE account. (Those on my private account must have been wondering why I haven’t had stories on there for a while.)’

The two WAGs have supported their husbands together (Picture: Getty Images Europe)

Coleen continued: ‘Over the past five months I have posted a series of false stories if they made their way into the Sun newspaper. And you know what, they did! The story about gender selection in Mexico, the story about returning to TV and then the latest story about the basement flooding in my new house.

‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to. Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

Coleen has yet to post the alleged screenshots as Rebekah fired back in her own statement: ‘As I have just said to you on the phone, I wish you had called me if you thought this. I never speak to anyone about you as various journalists who have asked me over the years can vouch for.

‘If you thought this was happening you could have told me & I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped. Over the years various people have had access to my Insta and just this week I found I was following people I didn’t know and have never followed myself.’

Advertisement

The reality star continued: ‘I’m not being funny but I don’t need the money, what would I gain from selling stories on you? I liked you a lot Coleen and I’m so upset that you have chosen to do this, especially when I’m heavily pregnant.

‘I’m disgusted that I’m even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened.’

It’s since been claimed Rebekah had hired forensic investigators to look at her Instagram for any hacks.
